Author: obviouslynotjackie
Text: Take the amount of calories you ate over your tdee and minus your tdee to see how many cals you actually ate. If youâ€™ve done that and consumed 3400 over your tdee, you may have gained a little less than a lb  I do the same thing, especially after eating oatmeal and carb-heavy foods because torturing myself is fun   I once binged on Doritos (and lots of carbs) at like, 11pm and weighed myself and I was up by 3-4lbs, and in the morning I was up by another 2lbs I would say, but a few days later I went back down to my previous weight!
